QuestData.Title: Shimmercap Stew
QuestData.Description: Say, while yer here, how bout ya help ol' Prigmon with a little chore? I got a friend who can make a mean stew - one like ya never tasted before!$b$bThere be a few ingredients found in these parts that he be needin'. They be in ruins to the southwest and the camp just north o' here.$b$bWhatd'ya say, mon?
QuestData.LogDescription: Prigmon in Granite Springs wants you to collect 5 Shimmering Snowcaps and 5 Ice Serpent Eyes from Drak'Zin Ruins and 5 Sweetroot from Zeb'Halak.
QuestData.CompletionText: You get those ingredients for 'ol Prigmon, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: Oh, mon - shimmercap stew! I can almost taste it already....
